snippet.title: Magical Drop VI || Nintendo Switch Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The legendary Japanese Arcade game is back! Choose your favorite character - will it be World, the Overseer of the Magical Land, the mighty
Justice or the devious Black Pierrot? - and play in one of the numerous game modes available.
Solve diabolical puzzles or beat strong opponents in an Arcade match. Follow an adventure in Story or Path of Destiny modes, full of twists and turns. Challenge your friends and the best players online!

Magical Drop VI features:
- More than 15 playable characters each with their own unique story and music tracks
- Local and online multiplayer modes
- Dozens and dozens of challenges
- 6 Solo game modes
- ...And many more surprises!
---------------------------------
